parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain can cause engine failure, leading to a loss of motive power, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine has a hard time starting
there is a noticeable roughness to the motor while running
and the check engine light comes on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear main seal/PCV valve can cause oil leaks, leading to engine damage and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: and the vehicle may experience rough idling or stalling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DSG transmission can cause the vehicle to hesitate or stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The failure of the clutch can cause the vehicle to stall or hesitate, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Loud metallic groaning sound when engaging first gear or reverse

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
The failure of the fuel pump can cause the engine to stall or hesitate, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine stalls and dies within 5-20 seconds after starting.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain or tensioner can cause the engine to stall or lose power, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The engine stalls or loses power
the engine makes a loud rattling or grinding noise
the vehicle is difficult to start or won't start at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the intake manifold can cause the engine to misfire, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: the engine makes a loud rattling or grinding noise
the vehicle is difficult to start or won't start at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition coil can cause the engine to misfire, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: the engine makes a loud rattling or grinding noise
the vehicle is difficult to start or won't start at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage and potentially causing accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: the engine makes a loud rattling or grinding noise
the vehicle is difficult to start or won't start at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clock spring can cause the loss of steering wheel controls, horn, airbag, and shifters, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The airbag warning indicator light is illuminated
the steering wheel controls do not function
the sunroof opens and closes by itself.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuse box can cause a fire, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the exterior lights do not function
the dashboard lights up with error codes
the sunroof opens and closes by itself.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the horn can cause accidents or injuries due to the inability to alert other drivers or pedestrians.
symptoms: a clicking sound is heard from the steering wheel when the horn is pressed

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause a fire, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the after-run coolant pump causes a voltage draw and confuses the ECM
the exterior lights do not function
the dashboard lights up with error codes.
